tool_description: Streak lets you keep track of all your deals right from your inbox. We let you group emails from the same customer together into one view and push that customer through your pipeline. When a new email comes in, you'll have all the context you need.
name: Streak
title: Streak

api_list.name: Edit a Pipeline
api_list.description: Edit the properties of a pipeline.

api_list.name: Edit a Specific Stage in Pipeline
api_list.description: This lets you edit the name of a stage.
